Topic.Title: Problems with verb synonyms and conjunctions

Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to set synonyms for verbs and I'm having a problem. The original verb is "hit," and I want to set the synonym "collide." It works fine when players type "collide [object]," but I need it so they can say "collide WITH [object]." I set the synonym "collide with," but it doesn't recognize it when you type it in the game. I have a feeling I'm not doing this right but I'm not sure what to look up in the documentation. 

Does anyone know how to set a conjunction along with a verb?
